surveypro_item.content:
RATE

This plugin, like all the others provided by surveypro core, is equipped with a set of common settings shared with all the other surveypro plugins.

The common settings set is done by:

  1. Required
  2. Indent
  3. Element number
  4. Hide filling instruction
  5. Variable
  6. Additional note

This plugin is equipped with some rate specific setting:

  1. Element style
  2. Options
  3. Rates
  4. Default
  5. Download format

and one validaion option

  1. Force different rate

The cartesian product of all these settings makes a very long list of possible implementations of this element. In this usertemplate few use cases are described.

• mandatory (so: "No answer" is not expected)
  • the default invites the user to choose a value
  • element style is set to "radio buttons"

Behaviour: The item is mandatory and the default is set to an invalid value so the user is forced to choose a valid option.
How confident are you with the following languages?

surveyprofield_rate.rates: mother tongue very confident not enough unknown

surveypro_item.content:
• not mandatory (so: "No answer" is expected)
  • the default invites the user to choose a value
  • element style is set to "radio buttons"

Behaviour: The item is mandatory and the default is set to an invalid value so the user is forced to choose a valid option or to tick the "No answer" checkbox.
How confident are you with the following languages?

surveyprofield_rate.rates: mother tongue very confident not enough unknown

surveypro_item.content:
• mandatory (so: "No answer" is not expected)
  • the default is set to a valid value
  • element style is set to "radio buttons"

Behaviour: The item is mandatory and the default is set to a valid value so the user can "fly" over this element leaving the proposed default untouched (and the question not read).
How confident are you with the following languages?

surveyprofield_rate.rates: mother tongue very confident not enough unknown
surveyprofield_rate.defaultvalue: unknown very confident very confident mother tongue

surveypro_item.content:
• not mandatory (so: "No answer" is expected)
  • the default is set to a valid value
  • element style is set to "radio buttons"

Behaviour: The item is not mandatory and the default is set to a valid value so the user can "fly" over this element leaving the proposed default untouched (and the question not read) or tick the "No answer" checkbox.
How confident are you with the following languages?

surveyprofield_rate.rates: mother tongue very confident not enough unknown
surveyprofield_rate.defaultvalue: unknown very confident very confident mother tongue

surveypro_item.content:
• not mandatory (so: "No answer" is expected)
  • the default is set to "No answer"
  • element style is set to "radio buttons"

Behaviour: The item is not mandatory and the default is set to a valid value so the user can "fly" over this element leaving the proposed default untouched (and the question not read).
How confident are you with the following languages?

surveyprofield_rate.rates: mother tongue very confident not enough unknown

surveypro_item.content:
• mandatory (so: "No answer" is not expected)
  • the default invites the user to choose a value
  • element style is set to "drop down menu"

Behaviour: The item is mandatory and the default is set to an invalid value so the user is forced to choose a valid option.
How confident are you with the following languages?

surveyprofield_rate.rates: mother tongue very confident not enough unknown
